notes.text:
An update is available for module.cockpit-podman, module.fuse-overlayfs, conmon, module.conmon, libslirp, podman, module.udica, module.container-selinux, buildah, crun, module.runc, slirp4netns, oci-seccomp-bpf-hook, module.buildah, fuse-overlayfs, module.criu, containernetworking-plugins, module.skopeo, skopeo, module.slirp4netns, module.oci-seccomp-bpf-hook, udica, toolbox, container-selinux, module.containernetworking-plugins, criu, module.podman, module.toolbox, module.libslirp, module.crun, cockpit-podman, runc.
This update affects Rocky Linux 8.
A Common Vulnerability Scoring System (CVSS) base score, which gives a detailed severity rating, is available for each vulnerability from the CVE list
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
The container-tools module contains tools for working with containers, notably podman, buildah, skopeo, and runc.

Bug Fix(es) and Enhancement(s):

* container-tools:3.0/podman exec fails with Error: an exec session with ID already exists: exec session already exists (BZ#2165695)

This advisory is provided by Ctrl IQ, Inc for Rocky Linux systems. For more information about CIQ security practices, visit https://ciq.com/security.
notes.title: Description

references.summary: * container-tools:3.0/podman exec fails with Error: an exec session with ID already exists: exec session already exists
Red Hat CSAF document for RLBA-2023:0851

document.title: container-tools:3.0 bug fix and enhancement update
